00029 class simbio_pgsql_field_info
00030 {
00031     public $name;
00032     public $type;
00033 
00037     public function __construct()
00038     {
00039         // just do nothing
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 class simbio_pgsql_result extends simbio
00045 {
00049     private $res_result = false;
00050     private $sql_string = '';
00051 
00055     public $num_rows = 0;
00056     public $field_count = 0;
00057     public $affected_rows = 0;
00058     public $insert_id = 0;
00059     public $errno = 0;
00060 
00067     public function __construct($str_query, $res_conn)
00068     {
00069         $this->sql_string = trim($str_query);
00070         $this->sendQuery($res_conn);
00071     }
00072 
00073 
00080     private function sendQuery($res_conn)
00081     {
00082         // checking query type
00083         // if the query return recordset or not
00084         if (preg_match("/^(SELECT)\s/i", $this->sql_string)) {
00085             $this->res_result = @pg_query($res_conn, $this->sql_string);
00086             // error checking
00087             if (!$this->res_result) {
00088                 $this->errno = 1;
00089                 $this->error = "Query failed to executed. Please check your query again. \n".pg_result_error($this->res_result);
00090             } else {
00091                 // count number of rows
00092                 $this->num_rows = @pg_num_rows($this->res_result);
00093             }
00094         } else {
00095             $_query = @pg_query($res_conn, $this->sql_string);
00096             // error checking
00097             if (!$_query) {
00098                 $this->errno = 1;
00099                 $this->error = "Query failed to executed. Please check your query again. \n".pg_last_error($res_conn);
00100             } else {
00101                 // get number of affected row
00102                 $this->affected_rows = @pg_affected_rows($_query);
00103                 // get last OID if it is insert operation
00104                 if (preg_match("/^(INSERT)\s/i", $this->sql_string)) {
00105                     $this->insert_id = @pg_last_oid($_query);
00106                 }
00107             }
00108             // nullify query
00109             $_query = null;
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00113 
00119     public function fetch_assoc()
00120     {
00121         return @pg_fetch_assoc($this->res_result);
00122     }
00123 
00124 
00130     public function fetch_row()
00131     {
00132         return @pg_fetch_row($this->res_result);
00133     }
00134 
00135 
00141     public function fetch_fields()
00142     {
00143         $_fields_info = array();
00144         $_f = 0;
00145         $_field_num = pg_num_fields($this->res_result);
00146         while ($_f < $_field_num) {
00147             $field_obj = new simbio_pgsql_field_info();
00148             $field_obj->name = pg_field_name($this->res_result, $_f);
00149             $field_obj->type = pg_field_type($this->res_result, $_f);
00150             $_fields_info[] = $field_obj;
00151             $_f++;
00152         }
00153         return $_fields_info;
00154     }
00155 
00156 
00162     public function free_result()
00163     {
00164         if ($this->res_result) {
00165             @pg_free_result($this->res_result);
00166         }
00167     }
00168 }
